metadata.title: CVE-2018-7287 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in res_http_websocket.c in Asterisk 15.x through15.2.1. If the HTTP server is enabled (default is disabled), WebSocketpayloads of size 0 are mishandled (with a busy loop).

criterions.comment: asterisk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
